data.text: @Allegra_Chapman I think they are already unreliable as no one has to take a LFT as a requirement if they are feeling unwell. Figures are definitely an under-estimate and I agree and will be more so as tests will have a cost attached.
@brightonland Yikes! Also now that LFTs aren't going to be freely available, the data on cases will be hugely unreliable.

@brightonland @Mo_Kanjilal Agree. I’ve been part of  @Join_ZOE study. They’ve just announced g’ment has pulled future funding from end of the month 🙁. Government done with COVID19 but we know #CovidIsNotOver
@AlexWMCallaghan I know so many people who have had it. But it is no longer in the news. I hope you are feeling better.
@brightonland I caught covid at a gig in Brighton recently - hasn't been fun! Anecdotally, I'm seeing an uptick in people testing positive
@Mo_Kanjilal @brightonland I wore a mask outside for the school run today, but I still have an extremely faint positive

@VanessaWelham1 @Mo_Kanjilal It’s so hard to do the right thing. I felt like this at the beginning of the pandemic when we were told masks were not necessary. I have been so diligent about wearing my mask & recently have been much more lax. I think we need some leadership & clarity to support/mandate safety
@Mo_Kanjilal @brightonland I wear mine too & got lots of frowns in petrol station & supermarket yesterday.
@brightonland people seem to have forgotten about it, meanwhile I know lots of people who have it right now, and I keep getting stared at for wearing a mask in shops etc
